mapper.update: update customer set customerName = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerPsd = #{customerpsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerSex = #{customersex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=DATE}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cuID = #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cuID, customerName, customerPsd, customerSex, Brithday, Tel, roleID, Address, Comment from customer where cuID = #{cuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cuID, customerName, customerPsd, customerSex, Brithday, Tel, roleID, Address, Comment from customer
